item.title: PHHP
item.description: “ We have been working with SandFil since the year 2012. item.title: Darton Management Recruiters (M) Sdn Bhd

They are attentive; understand our business processes, consistent in their follow-up and able to anticipate our needs in executive search industry. We have not come across any software error or major issues since we implemented the software early of the year. We recommend SandFil to manage the tedious recruitment processes for the search industry. Thank you. Yours truly, On behalf of Darton Management Recruiters,

item.title: KPMG

item.title: GS Paper & Packaging
item.description: “ This is to confirm that we have been happy with SandFil implementation since the implementation was done in year 2007. My team and I have been in contact with the research and development team in order to complete new installations for our career job portal and some ongoing upgrades. Throughout the project, the SandFil team was willing to go the extra mile to meet our needs and diligent in carrying out the work and solving issues.
